short_summary: Acquisition of calibration targets for hyperspectral thermal imaging
description: The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of Defence Research and Development Canada (DRDC) wants to acquire calibration targets for thermal hyperspectral imaging
duration_in_months: Weblink suplementary info and the proposal attached, to be declared as below on 2023-06-30 the estimated footing tax and extention and consolidations announce
